name: RoswellFiles
description:
My first 2D game. There were 3 conditions for this task: 

Use 5 colours only. 

Use 1 button only.

Finish within one week.

Controls: 1x space = jump , 2x space = double jump ,  hold space = teleport. 

Find out what happens, if a superagent who can teleport into alternative space and time got all the NSA secrets! 

Have fun playing ^^ (and don't rage quit :P)
